name: BreakawayRadio
0:
”Alexa, ask breakaway radio what's playing.”
”Alexa, ask breakaway radio to play live.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: breakaway radio
Developer Terms of Use
des: BREAKAWAY RADIO is a new radio station made specifically for students at Spring Arbor University. It is made by the students for the students, to feature the best in today’s Christian hip-hop, SAU news, sports, and other features.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
